TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CancellationToken extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 散佈通知，表示不應取消作業。

span.span: Propagates notification that operations should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可讓執行緒，執行緒集區工作項目之間的合作式取消或物件。A enables cooperative cancellation between threads, thread pool work items, or objects. 您建立的取消語彙基元，藉由執行個體化從擷取物件，取消語彙基元會管理其屬性。You create a cancellation token by instantiating a object, which manages cancellation tokens retrieved from its property. 然後，您會傳遞取消語彙基元給任何數目的執行緒、 工作或應該接收取消通知的作業。You then pass the cancellation token to any number of threads, tasks, or operations that should receive notice of cancellation. 語彙基元無法用來初始化取消。The token cannot be used to initiate cancellation. 當主控的物件呼叫、取消語彙基元的每個複本上的屬性設定為`true`。When the owning object calls , the property on every copy of the cancellation token is set to `true`. 接收通知的物件可以在適合的任何方式回覆。The objects that receive the notification can respond in whatever manner is appropriate. 如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例，請參閱[Managed 執行緒中的取消](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information and code examples see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用隨機號碼產生器，來模擬從 11 個不同的工具讀取 10 的整數值的資料集合應用程式。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 值為零表示度量已針對一個檢測，在此情況下應該取消作業和任何整體平均應該計算失敗。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 若要處理可能取消作業，此範例會具現化物件，會產生傳遞給的取消語彙基元物件。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 物件接著會傳遞取消語彙基元至每項工作負責收集特定的檢測的讀數。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 以確保平均值會計算所有讀數都已經成功之後，才會呼叫方法。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果工作已不是已取消，因為呼叫方法會擲回的例外狀況。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有的 public 和 protected 成員的是安全執行緒，且可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

Initializes the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立的語彙基元依然會在所指定的已取消狀態`canceled`參數。Tokens created with this constructor will remain in the canceled state specified by the `canceled` parameter. 如果`canceled`是`false`，這兩個和將`false`。If `canceled` is `false`, both and will be `false`. 如果`canceled`是`true`，這兩個和將`true`。If `canceled` is `true`, both and will be `true`.

summary.span: 取得這個語彙基元是否能夠處於已取消狀態。

span.span: Gets whether this token is capable of being in the canceled state.

value.span: 如果這個語彙基元能夠處於已取消狀態，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if this token is capable of being in the canceled state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果傳回`false`，這樣會保證，語彙基元將永遠不會轉換為已取消的狀態，表示永遠不會傳回`true`。If returns `false`, it is guaranteed that the token will never transition into a canceled state, meaning that will never return `true`. 無法取消的取消語彙基元所傳回的靜態屬性。A cancellation token that cannot be canceled is returned by the static property. 您選擇可以使用這個屬性來判斷是否可以進行的取消語彙基元取消 examing 之前的值屬性來判斷是否已取消。You can optionally use this property to determine whether a cancellation token can be canceled before examing the value of the property to determine whether it has been canceled.

summary.span: 判斷目前的 執行個體與指定的語彙基元是否相等。

span.span: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個取消語彙基元是相等，如果任何一個下列條件成立：Two cancellation tokens are equal if any one of the following conditions is true: - 它們與相同相關聯。They are associated with the same . - 兩者都從公用來建構他們建構函式，且其值是否相等。They were both constructed from public constructors, and their values are equal. - 這兩個取消語彙基元的值是。The value of both cancellation tokens is .

exception.span: 相關聯的 已經過處置。

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsCancellationRequested { get; }
.property instance bool IsCancellationRequested
Public ReadOnly Property IsCancellationRequested As Boolean
public: property bool IsCancellationRequested { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得是否已要求取消這個語彙基元。

span.span: Gets whether cancellation has been requested for this token.

value.span: 如果取消已要求此語彙基元。否則， 。

span.span: if cancellation has been requested for this token; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出是否已要求取消這個語彙基元，透過語彙基元已取消的狀態，一開始所建構，或是透過呼叫上相關聯的權杖的。This property indicates whether cancellation has been requested for this token, either through the token initially being constructed in a canceled state, or through calling on the token's associated . 如果這個屬性是`true`，它只保證已要求取消。If this property is `true`, it only guarantees that cancellation has been requested. 它並不保證每個已註冊的處理常式已完成執行時，也不發出取消要求已完成傳播到所有註冊處理常式。It does not guarantee that every registered handler has finished executing, nor that cancellation requests have finished propagating to all registered handlers. 額外的同步處理可能需要的特別是在情況下，同時取消相關的物件位置。Additional synchronization may be required, particularly in situations where related objects are being canceled concurrently. ## Examples 以下是簡單的範例執行的伺服器處理序，直到屬性會傳回`true`。The following is a simple example that executes a server process until the property returns `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested/cs/cancellation.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested/vb/cancelthreads.vb#12)] 此範例會具現化物件，用來控制存取權的取消語彙基元。The example instantiates a object, which controls access to the cancellation token. 然後，它會定義兩個執行緒程序。It then defines two thread procedures. 第一個定義為 lambda 運算式的集區鍵盤，並按下的"C"索引鍵時，會呼叫設為取消語彙基元已取消的狀態。The first is defined as a lambda expression that pools the keyboard and, when the "C" key is pressed, calls to set the cancellation token to the cancelled state. 第二個是參數化的方法， `ServerClass.StaticMethod`，會執行迴圈，直到屬性是`true`。The second is a parameterized method, `ServerClass.StaticMethod`, that executes a loop until the property is `true`. 主執行緒然後啟動區塊與兩個執行緒的執行緒執行，直到`ServerClass.StaticMethod`方法會結束。The main thread then starts the two threads and blocks until the thread that executes the `ServerClass.StaticMethod` method terminates.

Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As CancellationToken
public: static property System::Threading::CancellationToken None { System::Threading::CancellationToken get(); };

span.span: Returns an empty value.
An empty cancellation token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法取消的取消語彙基元這個屬性所傳回。也就是說，其屬性是`false`。The cancellation token returned by this property cannot be canceled; that is, its property is `false`. 您也可以使用 C# [default(CancellationToken)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default.md)陳述式來建立空的取消語彙基元。You can also use the C# [default(CancellationToken)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default.md) statement to create an empty cancellation token. 兩個空的取消語彙基元永遠相等。Two empty cancellation tokens are always equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個語彙基元已取消的狀態，委派將會立即和同步地執行。If this token is already in the canceled state, the delegate will be run immediately and synchronously. 委派會產生任何例外狀況會傳播超出這個方法呼叫。Any exception the delegate generates will be propagated out of this method call. 目前委派以及擷取，而且會在執行它時使用。The current is captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 目前不會擷取。The current is not captured.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個語彙基元已取消的狀態，委派將會立即和同步地執行。If this token is already in the canceled state, the delegate will be run immediately and synchronously. 委派會產生任何例外狀況會傳播超出這個方法呼叫。Any exception the delegate generates will be propagated out of this method call. 目前委派以及擷取，而且會在執行它時使用。The current is captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 如果`useSynchronizationContext`是`true`，目前，如果其中一個存在，也會擷取與委派一起而且會在執行它時使用。If `useSynchronizationContext` is `true`, the current , if one exists, is also captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 否則，不會擷取。Otherwise, is not captured.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會提供功能相當於：This method provides functionality equivalent to: C#C# ```csharp if (token.IsCancellationRequested) throw new OperationCanceledException(token); ``` ```vb If token.IsCancellationRequested Then Throw New OperationCanceledException(token) End If ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取這個屬性會導致来具現化。Accessing this property causes a to be instantiated. 最好只使用 必要時，這個屬性，以及然後處置相關聯儘早 (disposing 來源會處置這個已配置的控制代碼) 的執行個體。It is preferable to only use this property when necessary, and to then dispose the associated instance at the earliest opportunity (disposing the source will dispose of this allocated handle). 控制代碼不應關閉或處置直接。The handle should not be closed or disposed directly.

exception.span: 相關聯的 已經處置。

span.span: The associated has been disposed.
